file_content.text: Welcome, Jedi. I am Sonn-Vi, of the Three. This is a joyous day.
The interpreters speak. Gaden-Ko's vision is... genuine.
Gaden-Ko, we ordain you Mystic. Be always wise.
You've learned well. And grown up a little, too.
I'm proud of you.
I needed your guidance.
The completion of training marks a beginning, not an end.
Keep learning, Gaden-Ko.
I will remember.
Remember, Mystics still eat and breathe like the rest of us.
Don't let it go to your head.
A last lesson?
Gaden-Ko's entourage grows. Interpreters await. Healers travel from the shrine. Jenar-Sei volunteers to lead his guardians.
These guardians attend to his safety?
You mean a bodyguard?
Yes. A commando escort.
Has Gaden-Ko's vision been interpreted?
I'm curious about his vision.
I'm surprised you Voss had enough people to spare.
So many, for one boy.
For a Mystic, all things.
Gaden-Ko's vision remains.
The interpreters speak. Gaden-Ko's vision is clear. Unusually so.
He must see your Force. Both sides. He cannot learn here. Gaden-Ko must... travel with you.
My own insights compelled me to leave my home. He is welcome.
I know the need to wander.
If he is willing, Gaden-Ko is certainly welcome aboard my ship.
I'd be glad to have him.
I will see the galaxy that made you.
Gaden-Ko, certainly, but I don't have space for all those commandos and healers.
A whole entourage on one ship?
Rift Alliance has ships.
Heck, for a Voss Mystic, the Republic'll donate a fleet!
Tai Cordan has ships doing nothing.
It's okay. My world doesn't have enough ships, but Alauni or Tai or Duin will.
Outsiders have many vessels. His entourage can travel alongside.
It seems unfair he should achieve his dream and lose his people.
That makes him an exile.
My vision commands. I wish to go.
We gain a Mystic. Now lose him to the outsiders.
I am not lost.
The Jedi show kindness, patience, generosity. We should learn. Consider allying with the Republic.
The Republic would provide whatever you need to expand.
We have much to offer.
You must decide your alliances on your own.
I should not influence this.
Even if you don't ally with us--do not trust the Imperials.
At least throw out the Empire.
We will... consider it, Gaden-Ko.
I will remain neutral. So should Voss-Ka. Not Empire, nor Republic. Not yet.
Observe us both, then. Our actions will speak for us.
Yes, judge for yourselves.
Just don't leave us hanging for too long. Patience runs out.
We can wait. For a while.
No alliance? After all I did?
I say what is necessary.
We await your learnings, Gaden-Ko.
Carry Voss with you, always.
I shall.
Please, I must greet my entourage. Call when we leave.
Oh, let our Crisis World "allies" flap over that one.
